attributes.action: create more benefits for single people in full time work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we ( single poeple in full time work ) seem to be paying for all the scroungers in this country, we deserve more benefits and better tax breaks at the moment the amount of tax and ni i pay is extorsionate and i probably wont receive a state pension and i think its a disgrace.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
